channel.title: Please help! SCAR programming Question!
channel.description:
I need help really bad! Here is the problem
What method / code would I use in SCAR to copy and select text and then paste it in a different program? Right now i am using a screen capture program and it is horrible. It would be max 10 characters each "copy" . Basically, is there anyway to capture text and put it somewhere else in scar??
Please help!!!!

item.title: Please help! SCAR programming Question!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Do you want SCAR to read text and store or highlight and copy?
What are you copying from?

'cause you could activate the client based on its title (read the functions), either (ctrl + a), (ctrl + c) or move the mouse to the text, hold, move, release and (ctrl + c) then activate the next client window and (ctrl + p) where you want.

Need more information.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! SCAR programming Question!
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Not like the manual’s fucking useful at all, but at least you can look at what functions there are available:
http://freddy1990.com/wiki/index.php?title=SCAR_Manual:string_functions
(look at Copy, for a start…)

Read full topic
